title: Onion family soup with Gruyère croûtes
ingredients: ['15g unsalted butter', '1 tbsp olive oil', '3 large onions, halved and thinly sliced', '2 leeks, halved lengthways and thinly sliced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2 tsp fresh thyme leaves', '½ tsp caster sugar', '1 tbsp sherry vinegar', '3 small potatoes, about 300g in total', '1.4 litres beef stock (well-flavoured)', '4 fresh chives, snipped', 'GRUYÈRE CROÛTES', '3 thick slices wholemeal bread', '1 garlic clove, cut in half', '2 tsp French mustard', '75g Gruyère cheese, coarsely grated', '50g walnuts, roughly chopped']
